text: The state of Telangana, in southern India is divided into 31 districts. A 'district' in the state of Telangana is an administrative geographical unit, headed by a District collector, an officer belonging to the Indian Administrative Service. == Statistics == In terms of area, Bhadradri Kothagudem is the largest district with an area of and Hyderabad is the smallest with . Hyderabad district is the most populated district with a population of 3943323 and Kumarambheem Asifabad district is the least populated with 515,805. == District statistics == S.No. Name Headquarters Area (km2) Population (2011 census) No.of mandals Density (per km2) Urban (%) Literacy (%) Sex Ratio 1 Adilabad Adilabad 4,153 18 171 23.66 63.46 989 2 Bhadradri Kothagudem Kothagudem 7,483 23 143 31.71 66.40 1008 3 Hyderabad Hyderabad 217 16 18172 100 83.25 954 4 Jagtial Jagtial 2,419 18 407 22.46 60.26 1036 5 Jangaon Jangaon 2,188 13 259 12.60 61.44 997 6 Jayashankar Bhupalapally Bhupalpalle 6,175 20 115 7.57 60.33 1009 7 Jogulamba Gadwal Gadwal 2,928 12 208 10.36 49.87 972 8 Kamareddy Kamareddy 3,652 22 266 12.71 56.51 1033 9 Karimnagar Karimnagar 2,128 16 473 30.72 69.16 993 10 Khammam Khammam 4,361 21 321 22.60 65.95 1005 11 Kumarambheem Asifabad Asifabad 4,878 15 106 16.86 56.72 998 12 Mahabubabad Mahabubabad 2,877 16 269 9.86 57.13 996 13 Mahabubnagar Mahabubnagar 5,285 26 281 20.73 56.78 995 14 Mancherial Mancherial 4,016 18 201 43.85 64.35 977 15 Medak Medak 2,786 20 275 7.67 56.12 1027 16 Medchalâ€“Malkajgiri Medchal 1,084 14 2251 91.40 82.49 957 17 Nagarkurnool Nagarkurnool 6,924 20 124 10.19 54.38 968 18 Nalgonda Nalgonda 7,122 31 227 22.76 63.75 978 19 Nirmal Nirmal 3,845 19 185 21.38 57.77 1046 20 Nizamabad Nizamabad 4,288 27 366 29.58 64.25 1044 21 Peddapalli Peddapalli 2,236 14 356 38.22 65.52 992 22 Rajanna Sircilla Sircilla 2,019 13 273 21.17 62.71 1014 23 Ranga Reddy Shamshabad 5,031 27 486 58.05 71.95 950 24 Sangareddy Sangareddi 4,403 26 347 34.69 64.08 965 25 Siddipet Siddipet 3,632 22 279 13.74 61.61 1008 26 Suryapet Suryapet 3,607 23 305 15.56 64.11 996 27 Vikarabad Vikarabad 3,386 18 274 13.48 57.91 1001 28 Wanaparthy Wanaparthy 2,152 14 268 15.97 55.67 960 29 Warangal Rural Warangal 2,175 15 330 6.99 61.26 994 30 Warangal Urban Warangal 1,309 11 826 68.51 76.17 997 31 Yadadri Bhuvanagiri Bhongir 3,092 16 239 16.66 65.53 973 Telangana -
